items.title: Stella's Quest: Uncovering the Secrets of the Ancients
items.summary: Details: My contributions: Player character controls and movements Attack & Abilities (Attack/Animations cancel, dash, digging etc) Player Editor (adjusting values)…
items.content_html:
Details:

  • A 3D game inspired by The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening
  • Game project 4.
  • 8-week development (20 hours per week) with a wonderful team of 6 programmers, 3 level designers and 4 artists.
  • Game made with TGA's inhouse engine (TGE) in C++ and using Unity as Editor
  • https://carry.itch.io/stellas-quest 

 

My contributions:

  • Player character controls and movements
  • Attack & Abilities (Attack/Animations cancel, dash, digging etc)
  • Player Editor (adjusting values) using ImGui
  • Sweep Detection for collision (movements and dashes)
  • UI (Level Select , MainMenu, health and some other small parts)
  • Sound System wrapper for FMOD and all ingame sound events
  • System to instansering of models for rendering
  • Setting MSAA, some premake settings, exe and window name,

items.title: Abalabos: The Ascent of the Black Wizard
items.summary: Details: My contributions: Simple and short tutorial videos for my team how to setup and install Perforce, Unity and Visual…
items.content_html:
Details:

  • A 3D game inspired by Celeste.
  • Game project 3.
  • 12-week development (20 hours per week) with a wonderful team of 5 programmers, 2 level designers and 4 artists.
  • Game is made with TGA's inhouse engine (TGE) in C++ and Unity as Editor
  • https://carry.itch.io/abalabos 

 

My contributions:

  • Simple and short tutorial videos for my team how to setup and install Perforce, Unity and Visual Studio etc
  • Export and Import data (gameobjects, ui, scenes etc) from Unity to TGE
  • SceneManager & GameObject System
  • Rendering pipeline
  • Object Culling
  • Thread loading data and cache

items.title: Catdow
items.summary: Details: My contributions: Swipe System (Mouse and Touch-screen) Character movements (tile-based & turn based) Animation Controller for Player and Flytrap…
items.content_html:
Details:

  • A 3D game inspired by Lara Croft GO
  • Game project 2.
  • 6-week development with a wonderful team of 5 programmers, 3 level designers and 4 artists.
  • Game is made in Unity.
  • The game is targeting mobile-platform and developed for android os.
  • https://carrydev.itch.io/catdow 

 

My contributions:

  • Swipe System (Mouse and Touch-screen)
  • Character movements (tile-based & turn based)
  • Animation Controller for Player and Flytrap
  • Pushing & Pulling Crate System
  • Cauldron System to escape damage from light sources

items.title: Spoopy Sprint
items.summary: Details: My contributions: Unfortunate the school old Perforce server is removed and I have no way of recovering the code.
items.content_html:
Details:

  • A 3D game inspired by Temple Run
  • Game project 1.
  • 6-week development (20 hours per week)  with a wonderful team of 6 programmers, 3 level designers and 4 artists.
  • Game is made in Unity.
  • https://pinkbroccoliii.itch.io/spoopy-sprint 

 

My contributions:

  • Player's Rotation/Turn
  • Player's death when fail to turn in time
  • Candy pickups (plays vfx, increase score, remove candy)

 

 

Unfortunate the school old Perforce server is removed and I have no way of recovering the code.
